t: Catholic bookstores in the era of Amazon – Catholic World Report
s: The nearest Catholic book store to my home is about 30 minutes away. I was there buying gifts for 9 children in my family who were making sacraments of initiation this spring. They did NOT have a single copy of the Catholic Catechism. They offered to order it for me, with an arrival date of 5 days, and I would have to come back to get it. I can get it in 2 days from Amazon ...
